applicationVersions.description: Product Inventory System which manages stock levels of available products.
This application provides recommended actions to agents in the call centre.
Offers engine to recommend offers based on a customer's order.

A Customer Management application which manages the customer relationship, i.e. CRM.
This microservice handles payment processing for new orders and existing customer recurring charges.
Represents applications used in brick-and-mortar stores by employees.
This microservice performs credit checks on customers when they submit a new order.
A 360 Degree view of customers.
Customer Self Service application delivered in the form of a mobile app.
The Order Management system.
Billing system which handles billing for Mobile, Fixed and Cable customers.

eventVersions.description: This event is triggered when the Recommendation application generates a recommendation for a customer billing enquiry.

schemaVersions.description: Schema representing the event of an order being received. This version includes elements from Solace Topic levels.
Schema representing the verification of a customer. This version includes elements from the Solace Topic.
The Offer Generated schema. Contains detailed information about the offer.
Schema representing the event of an order being received. This version includes elements from Solace Topic levels.
Schema representing the line provisioned event where a line is provisioned for a customer. This version includes elements from the Solace Topic.
Recommendation schema for when agents need to respond to customer enquiries.
A schema representing a bill being issued to a customer. This version includes elements from the Solace Topic levels.
Payment Received schema for receiving payments. Includes elements from Solace topic
Schema representing a billing enquiry received from a customer. This version includes elements from the Solace Topic.
Schema representing a SIM Top Up Request being received. This version contains elements from the Solace Topic.
